name: Chargebee
natural_language_description: 这是 Chargebee 节点。主要用于: Retrieve data from Chargebee API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: invoice

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: delete

properties.name: properties
properties.description: Properties to set on the new user
properties.natural_language_description: 参数名: Properties | 作用: Properties to set on the new user | 默认值: {}
available_options: id (值: None) - ID for the new customer. If not given, this will be auto-generated.
first_name (值: None) - The first name of the customer
last_name (值: None) - The last name of the customer
email (值: None) - The email address of the customer
phone (值: None) - The phone number of the customer
company (值: None) - The company of the customer
customProperties (值: None) - Adds a custom property to set also values which have not been predefined

maxResults.name: maxResults
maxResults.description: Max. amount of results to return(< 100).
maxResults.natural_language_description: 参数名: Max Results | 作用: Max. amount of results to return(< 100). | 默认值: 10

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 作用: Filter for invoices | 默认值: {}

invoiceId.name: invoiceId
invoiceId.description: The ID of the invoice to get
invoiceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Invoice ID | 作用: The ID of the invoice to get | (必填项)

subscriptionId.name: subscriptionId
subscriptionId.description: The ID of the subscription to delete
subscriptionId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subscription ID | 作用: The ID of the subscription to delete | (必填项)

endOfTerm.name: endOfTerm
endOfTerm.description: Whether it will not cancel it directly in will instead schedule the cancelation for the end of the term
endOfTerm.natural_language_description: 参数名: Schedule End of Term | 作用: Whether it will not cancel it directly in will instead schedule the cancelation for the end of the term | 默认值: False
